body:
This patch has a huge impact on performance. Using the following benchmark:

```ruby
require 'benchmark'

N = 100_000

BLANKS = ['', '   ', "  \n\t  \r ", '　']

def bm
  BLANKS.each {|str| N.times { yield str } }
end

Benchmark.bm do |x|
  x.report("old") { bm {|str| str !~ /\S/ } }
  x.report("new") { bm {|str| str !~ /[^\s#{[[0x3000].pack('U')]}]/ } }
end
```

yields the following result:

```
$ ruby whitespace_benchmark.rb 
      user     system      total        real
old  0.300000   0.000000   0.300000 (  0.296738)
new  2.410000   0.000000   2.410000 (  2.409747)
```

The proposed version is an order of magnitude slower than the old one.
